story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
(This isn’t good—if I let my guard down, we
could be taken out...)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
(Knowing Garchomp is by my side puts my mind
at ease.)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: (If there’s one thing I’m certain of...)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
(it’s that we know we can rely on one another
in battle.)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: (And that trust we share is what empowers us both!)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: We’re safe now! Is anyone hurt?
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: U-um... I just wanted to say, you were so cool!
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I hope my partner and I can share a bond as
strong as yours and Garchomp’s someday!
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
(The strength I seek can be found if I stay true to
my own style!)
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I could see the power of your bond come out in
the way you and Garchomp battled together, and
it was amazing!
story_arceus_01_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Let Volo see how you two shine!
